original_title: Yuri. Sulle orme di Yuri Ahronovitch
overview: Yuri Ahronovitch was one of the most prestigious conductors in the former Soviet Union, head of Moscowâ€™s Soviet State Radio and Television Symphony Orchestra. After he moved to Israel in 1972, he began musical performances worldwide, including in Italy, where he conducted major orchestras for nearly three decades. We went on the road to meet artists, musicians, critics, friends and acquaintances who were qualified to talk to us about Yuri.
title: Yuri. Sulle orme di Yuri Ahronovitch
